website_summaries.verdict: Perfect for a cat lover who wants to literally sparkle in this silly sweater.
pros: Cute and sparkly design catches the eye
Bells ring, adding a fun bonus audible feature
cons: Might make you too popular with real cats

customer_reviews.title: Super cute & ugly Christmas sweater
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and ugly Christmas sweater! It’s made very well, does not look or feel cheap. Heavy and thick material - is warm. I can imagine the balls would fall off if you didn’t wash it delicate and hang dry, but other than that it’s a great find and I recommend it. Can’t wait to wear it to my office Christmas party!
customer_reviews.author: ELENA

customer_reviews.title: Fits slightly smaller than what I'm used to in a ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits slightly smaller than what I'm used to in a size M sweater. I don't think I would have ordered the next size up but if you're closer to large than small, you might want to go with large. Also, if you're tall, it's not long. I'm 5'4" and it comes to my hip bones.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 5

customer_reviews.title: Best sweater at the Christmas ugly sweater party.
customer_reviews.text: Loved, loved, loved this sweater. I received so many compliments at an ugly sweater party, it was the hit of the night. Good quality as well. The Pom poms are all over, even the back. Highly recommend this brand. I originally bought a large as well as a medium, because the medium just fit (I’m 5’8” with slender build). It can be snug, but I was wearing it for fashion vs. comfort. I’m going to return the large,
customer_reviews.author: Qbegood

customer_reviews.title: Meeeow!
customer_reviews.text: I was the hit of the party! Lost a few balls, but I can sew back on. Not able to put a coat on, with the fat fuzzy balls but I Survived!
customer_reviews.author: JukeBox729

customer_reviews.title: Unique and Cute
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a Christmas photo with my cat. I'm about 115 lbs and 5'6. The Extra Small fit me well. I wouldn't dare wash this, the bells and furry balls seem like they would be ruined in the wash. For the price, I'm very pleased with the coolness, cuteness, and uniqueness of this sweater.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Wortmann

customer_reviews.title: Cute but be prepared to do reinforcing all those balls and ribbons.
customer_reviews.text: Cute and fun in appearance, ran a bit on the large size, but one major complaint the balls and ribbons fell off way, WAY TOO EASY. They were not secured at all. I wore it to work and half a dozen fell off within the first hour.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute but a little uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I really love this sweater, received many compliments but it does get a little uncomfortable with all of the balls and a lot have fallen off since I have bought this. It’s good for a 1-2 time use.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for office parties. Very warm, good quality. Have lost one of the pom-poms but not a big deal. My colleague got the men’s one so it comes in men’s/women’s matching.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Extremely itchy and uncomfortable. The fuzzy balls were falling off within minutes. Extremely overpriced for quality.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Well made!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Everyone at my work Christmas party said I won for best ugliest Christmas sweater even though I think its adorable!
customer_reviews.author: Ariel Jensen

customer_reviews.title: I love this sweater and can't wait to wear it at ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this sweater and can't wait to wear it at our annual Ugly Sweater Contest As a cat lover, this sweater is purrrfect for me. Thank you Tipsy Elves
customer_reviews.author: janet m.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like it but it is a bit small. I'm afraid to wash it.
customer_reviews.author: Mom to boys

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: This sweater is actually cute and ugly. The quality is made very well. I think it will last for a long time! Can't wait to wear it to the office Ugly sweater contest. Got a small that fits snug, but if I'd gone one more size up, it may have fit a bit too lose so sticking with the small.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Prioleau

customer_reviews.title: It is even worse in person
customer_reviews.text: Anyone who buys this for a ugly sweater contest will hands down win. It is even worse in person!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Quality was much better than expected 😄
customer_reviews.text: Big hit with my 14-yr.-old granddaughter. Quality was much better than expected 😄
customer_reviews.author: Janis Mackey

customer_reviews.title: Really Ugly...PERFECT!!
customer_reviews.text: What I expected and ugly enough to win the contest!
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It a great festive sweater that lit up a Christmas party.
customer_reviews.author: Neal S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Ugly Sweater
customer_reviews.text: This Is one ugly sweater, but it won the contest at the office. Difficult to wear a jacket over it. But fit as stated.
customer_reviews.author: E. Never

customer_reviews.title: Truly a Doozy!
customer_reviews.text: ...but, I was swimming in it and returned it for a medium.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is the prettiest ugly sweater... I'm wearing it to the office Christmas party. Our them is Ugly Christmas Sweater. i absolutely love it. Very good quality ... Fits just right .. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Crupshaw

customer_reviews.title: Great sweater but the fur balls are sort of uncomfortable ...
customer_reviews.text: Great sweater but the fur balls are sort of uncomfortable and 2 fell off the night I wore it. Didn't take away from the ugliness though! Merry Catsmas
customer_reviews.author: Randi Howard

customer_reviews.title: Will be perfect for the ugly sweater contest we are having
customer_reviews.text: Will be perfect for the ugly sweater contest we are having. Actually it is cute and very well made. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene O.

customer_reviews.title: Hideous Christmas Sweater - Five stars!
customer_reviews.text: The sweater appeared on line to be hideous. Upon arrival in my home, I found it to be perfect. Thank you, your little elves make well-made, ugly Christmas sweaters. Five stars!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl K. Williams

customer_reviews.title: The quality is excellent. The "funness" is on the mark
customer_reviews.text: This sweator is just what I wanted. The Large is a little big for me (5'3", 125 lbs) but that's what I wanted so to wear with tight pants/leggings. The quality is excellent. The "funness" is on the mark.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Steinsiek

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Ugly Sweater
customer_reviews.text: It so ugly it is almost cute! Perfect for the Ugly Christmas Sweater Event
customer_reviews.author: Sandra DL

customer_reviews.title: Most Ugly
customer_reviews.text: I love it ! My kids think it's adorable ,it's comfy and I won Most Ugly sweater last night at Bunco so it's a winner!!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Very well made & soft
customer_reviews.text: Shipped well & fast. Beautiful, soft, adorable sweater for a holiday party.
customer_reviews.author: Karrie Loomis

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Quirky
customer_reviews.text: I received this just in time to wear to my Christmas festivities. Love it! I got head turns everywhere I go. One thing I didn't expect - those white 'fur balls' (not made of fur, lol, just look like it) are everywhere, even on the back and under the arms of the sweater. Crazy! I wore it a few times, and several balls have fallen off through natural wear, but I actually don't mind, because there are so many balls to begin with. In fact, the balls on the sides and under the arms made it just a wee bit awkward to move around. So, I don't mind at all the balls falling off. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: This sweater is high quality. I haven't worn it ...
customer_reviews.text: This sweater is high quality. I haven't worn it yet but did try it on. It seems to run a little large, in my opinion. I ordered one size up because some reviewers said that it was shorter than they are used to but I found that it is more than long enough and the arms are a little long.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I look forward to wearing my "fun sweater" at various parties this year~
customer_reviews.author: eileen

customer_reviews.title: Pretty ugly and sweet looking --- not sure about "large"
customer_reviews.text: Pretty ugly and sweet looking --- not sure about "large"..... planned on that. I am a medium. Went big. Let's say I will not be drying this bad boy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun and award-winning holiday sweater
customer_reviews.text: I won two ugly Christmas sweater contests with this sweater! Quality is good and I actually think it’s cute! I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: MiaMax

customer_reviews.title: Hairballs city
customer_reviews.text: It met my expectations and beyond, not only was it ugly and full of hairballs😳, it went well with the theme of the party we attended
customer_reviews.author: Smcflorida

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I am returning this sweater. I wore it for one night and the cotton balls started falling off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: This sweater exceeded my expectations! I love it and hope to win our Ugly Christmas Sweater competition in a few weeks. I also bought a Christmas light up hair bow and a Christmas lights necklace to complement this awesome sweater.
customer_reviews.author: TammyJ

product_meta.title: Tipsy Elves Women's Ugly Christmas Sweater - Cat Sweater with Bells
feature_bullets: Tipsy Elves Christmas Sweaters are perfect for your Ugly Christmas Sweater party, holiday pub crawls, the ski cabin, and they always make a great gift!
Our Christmas Sweaters are featured on ABC's Shark Tank, the TODAY Show, ABC's Wipeout!, People Magazine, Trendhunter, and much more!
See all of Tipsy Elves' Funny Christmas sweaters sold right here on Amazon. Shop over 50 exclusive designs for men and women! All ugly sweaters are brand new.
Our Christmas sweaters are made with high quality double-panel construction with reinforced seams. Machine washable and built to last.
All our products ship within 1-business day, Guaranteed.
